document.full_text: the good news is that there is a new policy to deal with athletes whose sex development is unusual. the bad news is that the new policy seems sexist in its philosophy.
document.title: essay: redefining the sexes in unequal terms
lines_and_colors: the good news is that there is a new policy to deal with athletes whose sex development is unusual. the bad news is that the new policy seems sexist in its philosophy.
